Bill Maher , liberal host of HBO 's " Real Time , " admitted on his show Friday that he hates President Donald Trump so much that he is " hoping " for another crippling economic recession . What did he say ? During a panel discussion , which largely centered around all things Trump , Maher noted the booming economy , which he said is not necessarily good for anti - Trump Americans like himself . " Could I ask about the economy ? Because this economy is going pretty well , " Maher said . Panelist Shermichael Singleton , also a Republican consultant , chuckled off - screen to Maher 's comment . " What ? Why was that funny ? " Maher asked . " It is going well — for now , " Singleton responded . " For now , right , thank you , that 's my question . I feel like the bottom has to fall out at some point , " Maher explained . " And by the way , I ’m hoping for it . Because I think [ARG1: one you get rid of Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: a crashing economy] . So please , bring on the recession . Sorry if that …
